subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: As he has tooled and retooled the Knicks, Isiah Thomas has gone to great lengths to cast them as a feisty underdog on the rise — albeit one with the league’s highest payroll.
snippet: As he has tooled and retooled the Knicks, Isiah Thomas has gone to great lengths to cast them as a feisty underdog on the rise — albeit one with the league’s highest payroll.
